features: Assessment Planner & Calendar; Project Planning; Class Schedule; Study Session Planner; Pomodoro timer; Tasks planning; Course planning; Passwords tracker; Duplicate the template in the top-right corner of Notion interface you will find the button “Duplicate” Click on it and you will create your workspace; Customize and personalize your template as you want it you can change the photos , blocks and everything to adapt the template to your needs
